```{r}
#| echo: false
#| message: false
#| warning: false
#| results: asis
pds_dashboards <- googlesheets4::read_sheet(ss = "1g0JHotuzAayKp-R1A60IqAk0DR7XzvPR7X6ThpSu_Zs",
                          sheet = "links")

library(glue)
library(dplyr)

# Generate HTML links
html_links <- pds_dashboards |>
  mutate(link_html = glue("<a href='{Link}' target='_blank'>{Person}</a>")) |>
  pull(link_html)

# Break into chunks of 3
html_matrix <- matrix(html_links, ncol = 3, byrow = TRUE)

# Turn into HTML rows
html_output <- apply(html_matrix, 1, function(row) {
  paste("<div style='display: flex; gap: 2em;'>", 
        paste0("<div style='flex: 1;'>", row, "</div>", collapse = ""), 
        "</div>")
}) |> paste(collapse = "\n")

cat(html_output)

```
